00022 class TcpSocketBase : public InetSocket
00023 {
00024     typedef InetSocket Base;
00025 
00026     public:
00027         BOOLEAN GetTcpNoDelayOption(BOOLEAN &nodelay) {
00028             return GetBoolOption(SysSocket::c_option_tcp_no_delay, nodelay);
00029         }
00030 
00031         BOOLEAN SetTcpNoDelayOption(BOOLEAN nodelay) {
00032             return SetBoolOption(SysSocket::c_option_tcp_no_delay, nodelay);
00033         }
00034 
00035         BOOLEAN GetTcpMaxSetOption(BOOLEAN &nodelay) {
00036             return GetBoolOption(SysSocket::c_option_tcp_max_seg, nodelay);
00037         }
00038 
00039         BOOLEAN SetTcpMaxSetOption(BOOLEAN nodelay) {
00040             return SetBoolOption(SysSocket::c_option_tcp_max_seg, nodelay);
00041         }
00042 
00043     protected:
00044         BOOLEAN Open(const InetSocketAddr *local_addr, BOOLEAN may_reuse_addr) {
00045             return Base::Open(c_type_stream, local_addr, may_reuse_addr);
00046         }
00047 };
